    level="1"
    right="Feat 20"

>
[Legendary Rider](/Feats.aspx?ID=6297) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=535" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 193 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Archetypes** [Cavalier](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=244), [Mammoth Lord](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=170) (Level 20)

**Prerequisites**
[Cavalier Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=6286)

</column>

---

You and your mount move like one being, effortlessly reading each other’s signals and synchronizing even in the thick of battle. Whenever you’re riding your mount, you are quickened; you can use the extra action only to command your mount using the [Command an Animal](/Actions.aspx?ID=2400) skill action.
name: Legendary Rider
